text: "This Kiss" is a 1998 song by Faith Hill and is the leading single from her third studio album Faith. It went to number 7 in the United States, number 18 in Scotland, number 24 in Canada, number 13 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in Australia and number 77 in the Netherlands and was nominated for 2 Grammy Awards in 1999. ==Track listings== US CD, 7-inch, and cassette single # "This Kiss" (radio version) – 3:18 # "Better Days" (album version) – 3:36 UK, European, Australian, and Japanese CD single # "This Kiss" (radio/pop version) – 3:18 # "Somebody Stand by Me" – 5:50 # "This Kiss" (Mr. Mig mix) – 3:47 UK cassette single # "This Kiss" (radio version) – 3:18 # "Somebody Stand by Me" – 5:50 ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:Country pop songs Category:Faith Hill songs
title: This Kiss (Faith Hill song)
